item.title: Azure â€“ Backup and restore SQL DB using SSMS
item.description: A quick post talking about how to backup and restore a SQL database on Azure using SQL Server Management Studio (SSMS). First, you will need to install SSMS. You can download it here: https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=875802 Once installed, in order to access the database, you will need the server name where is installed. So, you will have to check the Server name in Azure Portal (you can also do it by Powershell of course):
